page.title: 09"ONE DAY" by a COLYTON child
page.content: On a normal week day, I wake up about 7.30a.m.,and I dress, wash and go downstairs to breakfast.Then I go back upstairs, clean my teeth,get my school things ready and cycle to school wuth my friends. At school I study subjects such as: History, English, Geography, Music, Art and Drama. Then there are the sciences: Biology, the study of plants and animals, Physics,Chemistry and Maths. We also have a Computer room. At 3.40p.m. we go home. At home, I do my homework, which is extra work the teachers give us. Then I watch the television if it's a dull day, but when I get home, there are only programes on for little children.I have tea, which normally consists of bread,cakes and a cup of tea, at about 6.00p.m. When it's 9.30p.m., I go to bed often after watching more TV.
